Plot: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.
Title: The Wind That Shakes the Barley
Actors: Cillian Murphy, Padraic Delaney, Liam Cunningham, Orla Fitzgerald
tomatoConsensus: Bleak and uncompromising, but director Ken Loach brightens his film with gorgeous cinematography and tight pacing, and features a fine performance from Cillian Murphy.
Country: Ireland, UK, Germany, Italy, Spain, France, Belgium, Switzerland
